DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Field hockey contact sport . Semiflexion asymmetric position , along theory weakness extensor muscle back hamstring injury , cause aggravate suelan hockey player suffer back pain . Objectives : To observe effectiveness manual therapy technique post-isometric stretching ( PNF ) three treatment session . In turn , know two treatment great benefit longer . Methods : The population consist grass hockey player senior category age 16-30 year . They randomly divide two treatment group . Group 1 correspond manual therapy technique group 2 PNF stretching . The study duration subject 5 session include 3 treatment 3 assessment . Each evaluation consist goniometry , balance test use Sit Reach , Roland Morris questionnaire .
